extends StandardEntityViewLayer<Human>

                    java.awt.Graphics2D g,
                    ScreenTransform t)
        Description copied from class: StandardEntityViewLayer
        Render an entity and return the shape. This shape is used for resolving mouse-clicks so should represent a hit-box for the entity.
        Specified by:
        render in class StandardEntityViewLayer<Human>
        Parameters:
        h - The entity to render.
        g - The graphics to render on.
        t - A helpful coordinate transformer.
        Returns:
